House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01857
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO REINFORCE THE PROHIBITION AGAINST LABOR-ONLY CONTRACTING, AMENDING FOR THIS PURPOSE PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 442, ALSO KNOWN AS THE LABOR CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES, AS AMENDED
ABSTRACT : Makes it unlawful for employers to require contractual employees from discharging functions that are currently being performed by regular employees and outlawing the “5-5-5” labor contract, a labor scheme whereby a contractual employee is hired and fired every five (5) months by the employers.
